title: Did the women burn their breasts in protest against the Miss America contest in 1968?
subtitle: It is assumed that the Miss America contest in 1968 was born a decade of burning the bra by women as a means of drawing attention to their cause.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The Miss America contest in 1968 was born a decade of burning the bra by women as a means of drawing attention to their cause.
